short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL shortener with no ads or cookies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click URL shortening.  Shortens URL and copies it to clipboard by clicking the icon.  URLs which have already been shortened will show the 4 character code on the icon upon loading the page.
